haveHatchablePet: Ye 'ave a <%= potion %> hatchin' potion an' <%= egg %> egg t' hatch this pet! Click t' hatch!
dropsExplanation: Get these items faster with Sapphires if ye don't want t' wait for 'em t' drop when completin' a task. Learn more about th' drop system.
dropsExplanationEggs: Spend Sapphires t' get eggs more quickly, if ye don't want t' wait fer standard eggs t' drop, or t' repeat Quests t' earn Quest eggs. Learn more 'bout th' drop system.
premiumPotionNoDropExplanation: Magic Hatchin' Potions cannot be used on eggs receiv'd from Adventures. Th' only way t' git Magic Hatchin' Potions be by buyin' 'em below, not from random drops.
beastAchievement: Ye've earn'd th' "Beast Master" Medal fer collectin' all th' critters!
beastMasterText: Has found all 90 pets (incredibly difficult, congratulate this pirate!)
beastMasterText2: an' has releas'd their pets a total o' <%= count %> time(s)
mountAchievement: Ye've earn'd th' "Steed Master" medal fer tamin' all the' steeds!
mountMasterText: Has tamed all 90 steeds (ev'n more difficult, congratulate this pirate!)
mountMasterText2: an' has releas'd all 90 o' their steeds a total o' <%= count %> time(s)
triadBingoText: Has found all 90 critters, all 90 steeds, an' found all 90 pets AGAIN (HOW DID YE DO THAT!)
triadBingoText2: an' has releas'd a full stable a total o' <%= count %> time(s)
triadBingoAchievement: Ye've earned th' "Triad Bingo" medal fer findin' all th' critters, tamin' all th' steeds, an' findin' all th' critters again!
firstDrop: Ye've unlocked th' Drop System! Now when ye complete tasks, ye have a small chance o' findin' an item, includin' eggs, potions, an' food! Ye just found a <%= eggText %> Egg! <%= eggNotes %>
hatchedPet: Ye hatch'd a new <%= potion %> <%= egg %>!
hatchedPetHowToUse: Visit th' [Stable](<%= stableUrl %>) t' feed an' equip yer newest pet!
keyToPetsDesc: Release all standard Pets so tha' ye can collect 'em again. (Quest Pets an' rare Pets aren't affected.)
keyToMountsDesc: Release all standard Steeds so that ye can collect 'em again. (Quest Steeds an' rare Steeds aren't affect'd.)
keyToBothDesc: Release all standard Pets an' Mounts so tha' ye can collect 'em again. (Quest Pets/Mounts an' rare Pets/Mounts aren't affected.)
releasePetsConfirm: Are ye sure ye wanna release yer standard Pets?
releaseMountsConfirm: Are ye sure ye wanna release yer standard Steeds?
releaseBothConfirm: Are ye sure ye wanna release yer standard Critters an' Steeds?
releaseBothSuccess: Yer standard Critters an' Steeds 'ave been releas'd!
welcomeStableText: Welcome t' th' Stable! I be Matt, th' master o' th' beasts. Ever' time ye kermplete a task, ye'll 'ave a random chance t' receieve an Egg or an 'Atchin' Potion to 'atch Critters. When ye hatch a Critter, it'll appear here! Click a Critter's image t' add it t' yer Avatar. Feed 'em with th' Critter Vittles ye find an' they'll grow into hardy Mounts.
petLikeToEat: What does my pet like t' eat?
petLikeToEatText:
Critters'll grow no matter what ye feed 'em, but they'll grow faster if ye feed 'em th' one kind o' Critter Vittles tha' they like best. Experiment t' find out th' pattern, or see th' answers here:
http://habitica.fandom.com/wiki/Food_Preferences
dragThisFood: Drag this <%= foodName %> t' a Pet an' watch it grow!
clickOnPetToFeed: Click on a Pet t' feed <%= foodName %> an' watch it grow!
dragThisPotion: Drag this <%= potionName %> t' an Egg an' hatch a new pet!
clickOnEggToHatch: Click on an Egg t' use yer <%= potionName %> hatchin' potion an' hatch a new pet!
hatchDialogText: Pour yer <%= potionName %> hatchin' potion on yer <%= eggName %> egg, an' it'll hatch into a <%= petName %>.
clickOnPotionToHatch: Click on a hatchin' potion t' use it on yer <%= eggName %> an' hatch a new pet!
notEnoughPetsMounts: Ye haven't collect'd enough crtitters an' steeds
invalidAmount: Invalid amount o' vittles, must be a positive integer
tooMuchFood: Ye be wantin' t' feed too many vittles t' yer critter, action cancell'd
